programme.title: The Last Bridesmaid

programme.desc: France. When childhood friends Magalie and Blandine cross paths after many years, they decide to finally take their dream vacation to Greece.

programme.title: Good Luck To You, Leo Grande

programme.title: AfrAId

programme.title: Galaxy Quest

programme.title: Battleship

programme.title: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen

programme.title: Transformers: Dark of the Moon
programme.desc: An event from Earth's past threatens to ignite a war so big that the Transformers alone will not be able to save the planet.

programme.title: Dune: Part Two
programme.desc: Paul unites with Chani and the Fremen to seek revenge. Facing a choice between the love of his life and the fate of the universe, he must prevent a terrible future only he can foresee.

programme.title: Doomsday
programme.desc: In this futuristic action, it's been 25 years since a wall was built around Scotland to halt the Reaper virus. Now, London's in danger and a cure must be found while up north anarchy is rife.

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: When one police droid, Chappie, is stolen and given new programming, he becomes the first robot with the ability to think and feel for himself.

programme.title: Transformers: Age of Extinction
programme.desc: Humans come to realise that their new war against the Autobots could end with their own extinction when a threat more powerful than anything they have ever imagined presents itself.

programme.title: Bloodshot
programme.desc: Bloodshot, an ex-killer for the mob, is kidnapped and injected with microscopic computers, turning him into a superhuman. Escaping his makers, he seeks revenge.

programme.title: Gattaca
programme.desc: A man is labelled an 'In-Valid' because he was conceived not in the lab, but in love, in a future where 'designer people', forged in test tubes, rule society.

programme.title: Death Race 4: Beyond Anarchy
programme.desc: Connor Gibson, a Black Ops specialist, infiltrates a maximum security prison to enter the Death Race. A brutal world of no guards, no rules, no track, and no fear.

programme.title: Oblivion
programme.desc: A security repairman stationed on a desolate future Earth rescues a beautiful stranger from a downed spacecraft. Her arrival will trigger a chain of events that will leave man's fate in his hands.

programme.title: The Prince of Egypt
programme.desc: This is the extraordinary tale of two brothers, one born of royal blood, one an orphan with a secret past. Their final confrontation will forever change their lives - and the world.

programme.title: Home
programme.desc: When a cute alien lands on Earth and finds himself on the run from his own race, he forms an unlikely friendship with a brave little girl who's on a quest of her own.

programme.title: Despicable Me 4
programme.desc: Gru welcomes a new member to the family, Gru Jr, who's intent on tormenting his dad. However, their peaceful existence soon comes crashing down, when criminal mastermind Maxime Le Mal escapes from prison.

programme.title: The Munsters
programme.desc: From Rob Zombie comes the strangest love story ever told as Herman and Lily's crazy courtship takes The Munsters on a hauntingly hilarious trip from Transylvania to Hollywood.

programme.title: The Garfield Movie
programme.desc: Garfield, the Monday-hating, lasagna-loving indoor cat, is about to have a wild outdoor adventure.

programme.title: Nanny McPhee & The Big Bang
programme.desc: Nanny McPhee helps a stressed young mother trying to run the family farm while her husband is away at war.

programme.title: The Lost World: Jurassic Park
programme.desc: It has been four years since the disaster at Jurassic Park and two groups are in a race against time that will determine the fate of the remote island's prehistoric inhabitants.

programme.title: Beethoven
programme.desc: A vet targets a disaster-prone St Bernard for animal experimentation, and it's up to his family to save the cuddly canine.

programme.title: Antz
programme.desc: A worker ant changes roles with a soldier ant to woo a forbidden princess.

programme.title: Abominable
programme.desc: When teenage Yi encounters a young yeti on the roof of her apartment building, she and her friends embark on an epic quest to reunite the magical creature with his family.

programme.title: Detective Pikachu
programme.desc: Ace detective Harry Goodman goes missing, prompting his son Tim to find out what happened. Aiding the investigation is Harry's former Pokemon partner, Detective Pikachu.

programme.title: Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: Recruited from youngsters into the global spy game, four penguins are called into action by a mysterious espionage organisation in order to save the world from a villainous octopus.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: When aliens discover video feeds of classic arcade games and misinterpret them as a declaration of war, they attack the Earth, using the video games as models for their assaults.

programme.title: Christmas with the Kranks
programme.desc: Fed up with the commercial aspects of Christmas, the Kranks decide to skip Christmas this year and forgo the gifts, the tree, the decorations and to spend the dollars saved on a Caribbean cruise.

programme.title: How to Train Your Dragon: Hidden World
programme.desc: What began as an unlikely friendship between an adolescent Viking and a fearsome Night Fury dragon has become an epic adventure spanning their lives.

programme.title: Snow White and the Huntsman
programme.desc: In a twist to the fairy tale, the evil Queen Ravenna orders the Huntsman to capture Snow White so she can rule eternally; however, he trains her in the art of war to defeat the wicked ruler.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol
programme.desc: The IMF is shut down when it's implicated in the bombing of the Kremlin, causing Ethan Hunt and his new team to go rogue to clear their organisation's name.

programme.title: The Scorpion King
programme.desc: The ruler of wicked Gomorrah, who relies on a sorcerer's visions, lays waste to the tribes of the desert. The survivors hire an assassin to kill the sorcerer who turns out to be a beautiful woman.

programme.title: Punisher: War Zone
programme.desc: The most determined of all vigilantes in Marvel Comics wages a no-holds-barred, one-man war against a horribly disfigured crime lord called Jigsaw.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
programme.desc: A young Peter Parker/Spider-Man begins to navigate his new-found identity as the web-slinging superhero.

programme.title: Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom
programme.desc: Seeking revenge for his father's death, Black Manta uses the Black Trident's power to become a formidable foe. To defend Atlantis, Aquaman must forge an alliance with his imprisoned brother.

programme.title: Godzilla vs. Kong
programme.desc: Fearsome monsters Godzilla and King Kong square off in an epic battle for the ages, while humanity looks to wipe out both of the creatures and take back the planet once and for all.

programme.title: Repo Men

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (2014)
programme.desc: Based on the hit '90s animation, the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles are back and have teamed up with news reporter April O'Neill to save New York City from the evil Shredder.

programme.title: The Great Wall
programme.desc: A group of European mercenaries become embroiled in the defense of the Great Wall of China in this epic adventure.

programme.title: Dracula Untold
programme.desc: This is the original story of the man who became Dracula, a young prince whose people were threatened by a warlord and who protected them the only way he could: by becoming a monster.

programme.title: Doom
programme.desc: A frantic call for help from a remote research station on Mars sends a team of mercenary Marines into action.

programme.title: Land of the Dead

programme.title: Drillbit Taylor

programme.title: Shaun of the Dead

programme.title: Pitch Perfect

programme.title: Wanderlust
programme.desc: Rattled by sudden unemployment, a Manhattan couple surveys alternative living options, ultimately deciding to experiment with living on a rural commune where free love rules.

programme.title: The Cable Guy
programme.desc: A lonely, unhinged cable TV installer goes crazy as he forces his friendship on a lovelorn bachelor. A black comedy with pointed social commentary.

programme.title: Here Today

programme.title: National Security

programme.title: Starsky & Hutch

programme.desc: After the highs of winning the World Champs, the Bellas found themselves split apart and jobless. But when they get their chance for one last tour, they come together again.

programme.title: Downton Abbey

programme.title: Playing Cupid
programme.desc: A girl sets her single father up with her teacher after starting a matchmaking business for a school project.

programme.title: And So It Goes

programme.title: Steel Magnolias

programme.title: Monster-In-Law
programme.desc: Charlotte finally finds the man of her dreams only to discover that his mother is the woman of her nightmares.

programme.title: Book of Love

programme.title: Knocked Up
programme.desc: A one-night stand between a mismatched slacker and a career girl results in a pregnancy that leads to unlikely mutual support.

programme.title: Mona Lisa Smile

programme.title: It's Complicated
programme.desc: With a thriving bakery, a new romance and her divorce finally behind her, Jane Adler has her life all figured out, until her ex-husband Jake decides he'll stop at nothing to win her back.

programme.title: The Bodyguard

programme.title: The American President

programme.title: A Quiet Place: Day One

programme.title: The Idaho Student Murders

programme.title: Maria
programme.desc: Famed opera singer Maria Callas retreats to Paris in the 1970s after a glamorous yet tumultuous life in the public eye.

programme.title: The Three Musketeers: D'artagnan

programme.title: The Brutalist

programme.title: The Convert

programme.title: Oblivion
programme.desc: A security repairman stationed on a desolate future Earth rescues a beautiful stranger from a downed spacecraft. Her arrival will trigger a chain of events that will leave man's fate in his hands.

programme.title: The Wild Robot
programme.desc: Shipwrecked on a deserted island, a robot named Roz must learn to adapt to its new surroundings. Building relationships with the native animals, Roz soon develops a parental bond with an orphaned gosling.

programme.title: Dune: Part Two
programme.desc: Paul unites with Chani and the Fremen to seek revenge. Facing a choice between the love of his life and the fate of the universe, he must prevent a terrible future only he can foresee.

programme.title: War Of The Worlds (2005)
programme.desc: Aliens have come to Earth in masses to destroy the planet. As they plough through the country in a wave of mass destruction and violence, a man must come to the defence of his estranged children.

programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: When genetically modified dinosaurs run amok at a new themed resort, a former military man and animal expert must use his special skills to halt an all-out prehistoric slaughter.

programme.title: After Earth
programme.desc: A crashlanding puts a father and son on a dangerous planet - Earth. Hunted by an alien and by evolved animal species, the pair must work together to survive.

programme.title: Pacific Rim: Uprising

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: A spacecraft transporting thousands of people to a distant planet has a malfunction in its sleep chambers, and as a result two passengers are awakened 90 years too early.

programme.title: Transformers: The Last Knight
programme.desc: Humans are at war with the Transformers, and Optimus Prime is gone. It's now up to an unlikely alliance.

programme.title: Mad Max 2: The Road Warrior

programme.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
programme.desc: Godzilla and the almighty Kong face a colossal threat hidden deep within the planet, challenging their very existence and the survival of the human race.

programme.title: Geostorm
programme.desc: A system of satellites designed to protect the earth from natural disasters starts to malfunction, but who is responsible and can it be stopped?

programme.title: The 6th Day
programme.desc: A helicopter pilot who survives a near-fatal accident, returns home to find out that has been replaced by a duplicate version of himself.

programme.title: How to Train Your Dragon: Hidden World
programme.desc: What began as an unlikely friendship between an adolescent Viking and a fearsome Night Fury dragon has become an epic adventure spanning their lives.

programme.title: Wallace & Gromit: Curse Of Were-Rabbit
programme.desc: Wallace and his loyal dog, Gromit, set out to discover the mystery behind the garden sabotage that plagues their village and threatens the annual giant vegetable growing contest.

programme.title: Rise of the Guardians

programme.title: Despicable Me 2

programme.title: Over the Hedge

programme.title: Bee Movie

programme.title: Jumanji: The Next Level

programme.title: Mr. Peabody & Sherman

programme.title: Grand-Daddy Day Care

programme.title: Balto
programme.desc: A true story of a sled dog who braved the Alaskan wilderness to carry life-saving medicine to a remote village in 1925. A remarkable tale of a hero who inspired a nation.

programme.title: Scoob!
programme.desc: With hundreds of cases solved and adventures shared, Scooby and the gang face their most challenging mystery ever: a plot to unleash the ghost dog Cerberus upon the world.

programme.title: Sylvanian Families

programme.title: Paddington 2

programme.title: Chicken Run
programme.desc: A smooth-talking rooster crash-lands into a farm and attempts to help a group of chickens escape. With teamwork and a little bit of cluck, the fearless flock plots one last daring attempt for freedom.

programme.title: Tom & Jerry
programme.desc: A legendary rivalry re-emerges when Jerry moves into NYC's finest hotel on the eve of the wedding of the century, forcing the desperate event planner to hire Tom to get rid of him.

programme.title: Despicable Me

programme.title: Land of the Dead

programme.title: Mission: Impossible III
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt must bring down a ruthless villain and rescue his fiancee.

programme.title: Hummingbird

programme.title: Blade

programme.desc: In search of his next big story, Eddie lands an exclusive interview with convicted murderer Cletus Kasady, who discovers Eddie's secret and becomes the host for Carnage.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 3
programme.desc: After the highs of winning the World Champs, the Bellas found themselves split apart and jobless. But when they get their chance for one last tour, they come together again.

programme.title: Sex Tape
programme.desc: When they make a three-hour sex tape to spice up their love life, a husband and wife realise they're in trouble when the epic recording threatens to go viral! A delightfully crude comedy.

programme.title: A Series of Unfortunate Events
programme.desc: After their parents perish in a terrible fire, three orphaned siblings are placed in the care of the evil genius Count Olaf, who hatches an outrageous plot to steal their inheritance.

programme.title: Daddy's Home 2
programme.desc: Having finally gotten used to each other's existence, Brad and Dusty must now deal with their intrusive fathers during the holidays.

programme.title: The Hangover Part II
programme.desc: Phil, Stu and their mates travel to Thailand for Stu's subdued pre-wedding brunch after the unforgettable bachelor party in Vegas. However, things don't go to plan.

programme.title: Happy Gilmore
programme.desc: Happy doesn't just play golf, he destroys it. With the help of a retired golfer and hot publicist, can Happy perfect his game and tame his temper to win the tournament prize money?

programme.title: Starsky & Hutch
programme.desc: Join uptight David Starsky and laid-back Ken 'Hutch' Hutchinson as they're paired for the first time as undercover cops and are forced overcome their differences to solve an important case.

programme.title: Fun Mom Dinner
programme.desc: Four mums, whose only common ground is their kids' preschool class, get together for a dinner. The night begins as a disaster, but they have more in common than they thought.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
programme.desc: A goofy pet detective is hired to track down Snowflake, the Miami Dolphins' mascot.

programme.title: Fun With Dick And Jane (2005)
programme.desc: A couple who lose their minds whilst trying to hold onto the elusive American dream, turn to crime to get back in the black and outwit a greedy, corporate executive.

programme.title: Johnny English Strikes Again
programme.desc: After a cyber-attack reveals the identity of all of the active undercover agents in Britain, Johnny English is forced to come out of retirement to find the mastermind hacker.

programme.title: Boy
programme.desc: A hoodlum father comes home to his son, who had created an elaborate myth around his dad's disappearance.

programme.title: The Benchwarmers
programme.desc: Three older guys get to fulfil their childhood sporting dreams becoming heroes to the bullied, clumsy and athletically-challenged everywhere.

programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop 2
programme.desc: After six years of keeping New Jersey malls safe, an overzealous security guard learns that duty never rests when he heads to Las Vegas for a well-earned vacation with his teen daughter.

programme.title: Mr. Deeds
programme.desc: Life flips over for a small-town pizzeria owner and poet who inherits $40 billion. Sleazy moguls come to whisk him and his money away to corporate America.

programme.title: Fun Mom Dinner
programme.desc: Four mums, whose only common ground is their kids' preschool class, get together for a dinner. The night begins as a disaster, but they have more in common than they thought.

programme.title: Scary Movie
programme.desc: In this send-up of the most popular horror movies, a familiar-looking group of teenagers find themselves being stalked by a more-than-vaguely recognisable masked killer.

programme.title: Book of Love
programme.desc: An uptight English writer's book is a failure but a hit in Mexico. When he's invited there to promote it, he discovers his Spanish translator has rewritten his book as an erotic novel.

programme.title: Knocked Up
programme.desc: A one-night stand between a mismatched slacker and a career girl results in a pregnancy that leads to unlikely mutual support.

programme.title: Mona Lisa Smile
programme.desc: A free-thinking art professor teaches conservative 1950s Wellesley girls to question their traditional societal roles, encouraging them to be more interested in a career than nabbing a good husband.

programme.title: It's Complicated
programme.desc: With a thriving bakery, a new romance and her divorce finally behind her, Jane Adler has her life all figured out, until her ex-husband Jake decides he'll stop at nothing to win her back.

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: A bodyguard is sent to protect a pop-music diva from a homicidal fan. At first repelled by each other, passion ignites as danger explodes around them.

programme.title: The American President
programme.desc: When the widowed US president courts a Washington lobbyist, wild rumours decimate his approval ratings. An intelligent political-romantic comedy.

programme.title: The Notebook
programme.desc: Two perfect lovers, torn apart by disapproving families, find each other later in life when the woman is engaged to a handsome soldier. Can they rekindle their feelings?

programme.title: The Intern
programme.desc: After discovering that retirement isn't all it's cracked up to be, a 70-year-old widower seizes an opportunity to become a senior intern at an online fashion site.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: Native New Yorker Rachel accompanies her long-time boyfriend Nick to his friend's wedding in Singapore. But she's unprepared to learn a few key details about his life.

programme.title: Bridget Jones: The Edge of Reason
programme.desc: Everyone's favourite heroine is back and looking for love in her inimitable style. After finding the perfect boyfriend, her old playboy boss arrives and the fireworks begin.

programme.title: Sisters
programme.desc: Given one weekend to clean out their childhood bedroom before their parents sell their family home, two sisters decide to throw one last epic party.

programme.title: Baby Mama
programme.desc: Kate is a successful career woman who wants something more, a baby. But she gets more than she bargained for when she hires Angie, a free spirit, to be her surrogate in a hysterical mama match-up.

programme.title: The Notebook
programme.desc: Two perfect lovers, torn apart by disapproving families, find each other later in life when the woman is engaged to a handsome soldier. Can they rekindle their feelings?

programme.title: I.S.S.
programme.desc: Tensions flare in the near-future aboard the International Space Station as a conflict breaks out on Earth.

programme.title: The Frozen Ground

programme.title: Everybody's Fine

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds
programme.desc: As war rages in Europe, a Nazi-scalping squad of American soldiers, known to their enemy as The Basterds, is on a daring mission to take down the leaders of the Third Reich.

programme.title: Fury
programme.desc: On a deadly mission behind enemy lines a wily WWII sergeant, his loyal Sherman tank crew and a rookie soldier find themselves hopelessly outnumbered.

programme.title: Conspiracy Theory
programme.desc: A crackpot New York cabbie lands in trouble after his conspiracy magazine attracts the interest of shady government heavies and leads to five unexplained murders.

programme.title: Cast Away
programme.desc: A FedEx systems engineer's ruled-by-the-clock existence abruptly ends when a harrowing plane crash leaves him isolated on a remote island.

programme.title: Cold Pursuit

programme.title: Children of Men
programme.desc: It's 2027. There have been no births for 18 years. Humanity is doomed. Then Clive Owen discovers the key to survival, but can he protect his precious cargo?

programme.title: Gothika
programme.desc: A brilliant criminal psychologist who treats disturbed patients at a women's prison has her life thrust into terrifying jeopardy after a cryptic encounter with a mysterious young girl.

programme.title: Basic Instinct

programme.desc: A classic comedy based around a group of WWII soldiers who plan to steal a treasure trove from the Nazis.

programme.title: Back To The Future II
programme.desc: Marty McFly returns, this time travelling forward to 2015 with wacky Doc Brown to save his kids. Their crazy time-travels have a mind-bending effect on history.

programme.desc: Two years after the tragic events that plagued Sidney she's moved to college putting the shocking killings behind her. That is until a copycat killer begins acting out a real-life sequel.

programme.title: Scary Movie
programme.desc: In this send-up of the most popular horror movies, a familiar-looking group of teenagers find themselves being stalked by a more-than-vaguely recognisable masked killer.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
programme.desc: A goofy pet detective is hired to track down Snowflake, the Miami Dolphins' mascot.

programme.title: Johnny English Strikes Again
programme.desc: After a cyber-attack reveals the identity of all of the active undercover agents in Britain, Johnny English is forced to come out of retirement to find the mastermind hacker.

programme.title: Billy Madison
programme.desc: A 27-year-old spoiled brat must repeat all 12 grades of school - in just 24 weeks - to earn his father's respect and prove he can run the family's multimillion-dollar empire.

programme.title: The Benchwarmers
programme.desc: Three older guys get to fulfil their childhood sporting dreams becoming heroes to the bullied, clumsy and athletically-challenged everywhere.

programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop 2
programme.desc: After six years of keeping New Jersey malls safe, an overzealous security guard learns that duty never rests when he heads to Las Vegas for a well-earned vacation with his teen daughter.

programme.title: Mr. Deeds
programme.desc: Life flips over for a small-town pizzeria owner and poet who inherits $40 billion. Sleazy moguls come to whisk him and his money away to corporate America.

programme.title: Little Nicky
programme.desc: When Satan refuses to retire, two of his heirs leave Hell for New York City to gather enough souls to vote the Prince of Darkness out of office.

programme.title: Dolittle
programme.desc: The eccentric Dr Dolittle sets sail on an epic adventure to a mythical island, regaining his wit and courage as he crosses old adversaries and discovers wondrous creatures.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2
programme.desc: Beca, Fat Amy and the Barden Bellas are back to pitch slap the world. After a scandal threatens to derail their last year at Barden, they worry that they've lost their harmony for good.

programme.title: Forgetting Sarah Marshall
programme.desc: A struggling musician escapes to Hawaii on a vacation after he is jilted by his television star girlfriend Sarah for another guy, only to find his ex staying in the same hotel with her new man.

programme.title: The War With Grandpa
programme.desc: When grandfather Ed moves in, Peter is forced to give up his bedroom. Unwilling to tolerate this injustice, Peter devises a series of pranks to drive him out.

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: Stumbling onto what could be one of the biggest crimes in years, can misfit NYPD detectives step up their game to solve the case without killing each other and destroying NYC in the process?

programme.title: Night School
programme.desc: A man must attend night school classes alongside a group of oddballs in order to earn his much needed diploma.

programme.title: Little Nicky
programme.desc: When Satan refuses to retire, two of his heirs leave Hell for New York City to gather enough souls to vote the Prince of Darkness out of office.

programme.title: The Notebook
programme.desc: Two perfect lovers, torn apart by disapproving families, find each other later in life when the woman is engaged to a handsome soldier. Can they rekindle their feelings?

programme.title: The Intern
programme.desc: After discovering that retirement isn't all it's cracked up to be, a 70-year-old widower seizes an opportunity to become a senior intern at an online fashion site.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: Native New Yorker Rachel accompanies her long-time boyfriend Nick to his friend's wedding in Singapore. But she's unprepared to learn a few key details about his life.

programme.title: Bridget Jones: The Edge of Reason
programme.desc: Everyone's favourite heroine is back and looking for love in her inimitable style. After finding the perfect boyfriend, her old playboy boss arrives and the fireworks begin.

programme.title: Sisters
programme.desc: Given one weekend to clean out their childhood bedroom before their parents sell their family home, two sisters decide to throw one last epic party.

programme.title: Baby Mama
programme.desc: Kate is a successful career woman who wants something more, a baby. But she gets more than she bargained for when she hires Angie, a free spirit, to be her surrogate in a hysterical mama match-up.

programme.title: Her
programme.desc: Heartbroken after the end of a relationship, a man falls for a new, advanced operating system - a bright, female voice, who is insightful and surprisingly funny.

programme.title: Emma.
programme.desc: Jane Austen's beloved comedy about finding your equal and earning your happy ending is reimagined in this delicious film adaptation.

programme.title: Memoirs of a Geisha
programme.desc: A stunning adaptation of Arthur Golden's bestselling novel set in an exotic world tells the story of a servant who blossoms against all odds to become the most enchanting geisha of her day.

programme.title: The Five-Year Engagement
programme.desc: An engaged couple keep getting tripped up on their long walk down the aisle.

programme.title: My Best Friend's Wedding
programme.desc: Jules realises she's in love with her best friend, who's about to marry someone else. She'll do anything to steal him away, except tell him the truth.

programme.title: About Time
programme.desc: A comedy about a young man who discovers on his 21st birthday that he can travel in time, and change what happens and has happened in his own life.

programme.title: Her
programme.desc: Heartbroken after the end of a relationship, a man falls for a new, advanced operating system - a bright, female voice, who is insightful and surprisingly funny.

programme.title: Basic Instinct
programme.desc: Detective Nick Curran's investigation of a rock star's brutal murder with an ice pick leads him to the beautiful bestselling author Catherine Tramell.

programme.title: Conspiracy Theory
programme.desc: A crackpot New York cabbie lands in trouble after his conspiracy magazine attracts the interest of shady government heavies and leads to five unexplained murders.

programme.title: Cast Away
programme.desc: A FedEx systems engineer's ruled-by-the-clock existence abruptly ends when a harrowing plane crash leaves him isolated on a remote island.

programme.title: Cold Pursuit
programme.desc: It's -10 degrees in the Rocky Mountains and the son of unassuming town snowplough driver, Nels Coxman, is murdered at the order of Viking, a flamboyant drug lord.

programme.title: Children of Men
programme.desc: It's 2027. There have been no births for 18 years. Humanity is doomed. Then Clive Owen discovers the key to survival, but can he protect his precious cargo?

programme.title: Gothika
programme.desc: A criminal psychologist who treats dangerously disturbed patients at a women's prison has her life thrust into terrifying jeopardy after a cryptic encounter with a mysterious young girl.

programme.title: Donnie Brasco
programme.desc: An FBI undercover agent infiltrates the mob and finds himself identifying more with the mafia life to the expense of his regular one.

programme.title: Ordinary Angels
programme.desc: A struggling hairdresser finds a renewed sense of purpose when she meets a widowed father and his two daughters.

programme.title: Cape Fear
programme.desc: Fourteen years after being imprisoned, vicious psychopath Max Cady emerges with a single-minded mission: to seek revenge on his attorney Sam Bowden.

programme.title: Bob Marley: One Love
programme.desc: Celebrates the life of an icon who inspires generations. In this uplifting film, discover Bob Marley's story of overcoming adversity and the journey behind his revolutionary music that change the world.

programme.title: Bee Gees: Broken Heart
programme.desc: An exploration of the history of the Bee Gees, featuring revealing interviews with oldest brother Barry Gibb, and archival interviews with the late twin brothers Robin and Maurice.

programme.title: Sound of Metal
programme.desc: When ex-addict Ruben unexpectedly loses his hearing his life is thrown into turmoil. In a group home for Deaf addicts, he must choose between his new community and the life of sound he left behind.

programme.title: Donnie Brasco
programme.desc: An FBI undercover agent infiltrates the mob and finds himself identifying more with the mafia life to the expense of his regular one.

programme.title: Uncle Buck

programme.title: Blues Brothers 2000
programme.desc: Sequel to the 1980 cult classic, Jake and Elwood must reunite the old band, with a few new members, and go on another "Mission from God".

programme.title: Dead Calm
programme.desc: A couple rescues a half-delirious sole survivor of a crippled schooner, but soon the stranger will plunge the unwary pair into an intense battle of cat and mouse. And life or death.

programme.title: Kelly's Heroes
programme.desc: A classic comedy based around a group of WWII soldiers who plan to steal a treasure trove from the Nazis.

programme.title: The River Wild
programme.desc: An expert rafter takes her family for a day out on the river. But when two bank robbers hijack their raft, it turns into a white-water knuckle-biter.

programme.title: Dante's Peak

programme.title: Schindler's List
programme.desc: The true story of Nazi party member Oskar Schindler, who saved the lives of more than 1100 Jews during the Holocaust.

programme.title: Parenthood

programme.title: Foul Play
programme.desc: This bizarre, Hitchcockian comedy sees a kooky divorcee and a bumbling Federal agent take on a posse of Hollywood weirdos planning to assassinate the Pope.

programme.title: National Lampoon's Vacation
programme.desc: The Griswold family's cross-country drive to the Walley World theme park proves to be harder than they ever anticipated.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II

programme.title: Nazi War Machines: Secrets Uncovered
programme.desc: James goes to the depths with the Wolf Packs - the force that threatened Britain's survival like no other. He explores the U-boat fleet, from suicidal one-man torpedoes to the potentially game-changing Type XXI.

programme.title: Narrow Escapes of World War II
programme.desc: He orchestrated one of the most brilliant escapes in history. His genius was all the greater given that he wasn't just fighting the massed ranks of the Red Army, he was also at war with the Fuhrer himself.

programme.title: Secret Weapons Of World War II
programme.desc: Explores weapons designed for partisans and assassins, prioritises stealth and ease of hiding. Novel codes, decoys and specialised firearms are utilised by spies and saboteurs to maintain secrecy.

programme.title: Time Team
programme.desc: The team visit a site near Stilton where a clutch of Roman objects have been discovered. However their investigations take a twist when it becomes apparent that the site had more uses than first anticipated.

programme.title: Kennedy
programme.desc: When the United States joins the war against Nazi Germany and Japan, Kennedy volunteers for the Navy and is deployed to the Pacific.

programme.title: Dictators' Hideouts
programme.desc: Ukrainian dictator Yanukovych hides stolen billions in Mezhyhirya, a lavish estate of tunnels, gold, and kitsch. But can it shield him from the people's wrath?

programme.title: Hitler's Engineers
programme.desc: Investigates Volkswagen Beetle designer Ferdinand Porsche, infamous architect Albert Speer, aerospace pioneer Wernher von Braun, and more.

programme.title: The Rise Of The Nazi Party
programme.desc: Not everything goes according to Hitler's plans. Rommel is defeated at the battle of El Alamein in November 1942, and Keitel's army is crushed at Stalingrad in February 1943.

programme.title: Time Team
programme.desc: The team descend on the village of Wicken on the outskirts of Milton Keynes. Digging in residents' gardens, the team uncover a mysterious church, an ancient burial ground and evidence of a Saxon community.

programme.title: One Perfect Wedding
programme.desc: With Cara & Ben's work commitments keeping them so busy, they decide they can't postpone their nuptials any longer.

programme.title: Junebug
programme.desc: When an 8-year-old version of herself starts appearing to her, Juniper begins to realise that life is not what she had hoped it would be. Young Junebug pushes Juniper to start writing again.

programme.title: Bernie the Dolphin 2
programme.desc: The kids are thrilled that Bernie has come back. But so has their old enemy Winston, who's about to kidnap the talented dolphin. Kevin and Holly must rescue their splashy friend before it's too late.

programme.title: New Creation Church
programme.sub-title: God_s Plan To Prosper You In The End Times Pt 2 of 4
programme.desc: Pastor Joseph Prince preaches messages centred on the pure gospel of the grace of God.

programme.title: God Rocks! Playlist
programme.desc: Join kid-hosts Myles and Stella for a fun, non-stop musical playlist of hit songs about Faith and Trust!

programme.title: Hunter & Twerp Scripture Seekers
programme.desc: Welcome to the wonderful world of Brightington, home of Hunter and Twerp, Scripture Seekers! Stacks of fun Bible lessons for children to enjoy.

programme.title: GGC Life TV
programme.desc: With a vision for a church that is relatable, enjoyable and uplifting, Glorious Gospel Church and their values are based firmly in the bible and their aim is to express the Good News of Jesus Christ.

programme.title: Centuries Collide
programme.sub-title: St Nicholas - St Nick or Santa?
programme.desc: Every year, baby Jesus and Santa dominate all Christmas imagery. In this episode we discover his fascinating 1700 year evolution from a bishop of ancient Turkey to Santa Clause.

programme.title: Sugarcreek Amish Mysteries
programme.desc: After Cheryl's devastating breakup, her aunt offers her an escape from Chicago to the Amish town of Sugarcreek. Struggling, Cheryl uncovers an unsettling secret that could disrupt the small town.

programme.title: Planetshakers
programme.desc: Join Planetshakers for their church service in Melbourne. A fresh Word with praise and worship each week. Live empowered.

programme.title: Jentezen Franklin
programme.desc: New York Times bestselling author, Pastor Jentezen Franklin, brings practical meaning to spiritual truths found in God's Word. Kingdom Connection is the teaching ministry of Free Chapel, a multi-campus church with a global ministry.

programme.title: Joyce Meyer: Enjoying Everyday Life
programme.desc: Do you lean on God's Word during trying times? Today, Joyce teaches on the importance of leaning into His Word and trusting in His wisdom to guide us through life's challenges.

programme.title: David Jeremiah
programme.desc: Our prayers for others shouldn't just be for their physical needs. In Paul's prayer for the Colossian believers we find an example of how to pray for others to grow in their walk with the Lord.

programme.title: Joel Osteen
programme.desc: Direct from Houston, Texas, join Joel and Victoria Osteen and the team from Lakewood Church, for a session of powerful music and empowering preaching.

programme.title: A Thousand Tomorrows
programme.desc: Settling into ranch and rodeo life, Cody and Ali must answer the ultimate question: How will they spend the tomorrows' God has given them?

programme.title: Live @ Psalter Studios
programme.desc: Docu-music series featuring an array of Christian musicians including Josh Cunningham, Anna Weatherup and Castles In Air, an Indie Rock band from California who toured in Australia in 2012.

programme.title: A Cathedral Pilgrimage
programme.desc: A Pilgrimage through Britain's Great Cathedrals explores cathedrals & abbeys found throughout England & Wales, featuring interviews with historians & experts & breathtaking footage.

programme.title: Everytown Downunder
programme.desc: Follow Australia's most travelled music evangelist, Steve Grace and his team on a 25,000km road trip from bush to beach, performing 78 evangelical concerts.

programme.title: Veggie Tales
programme.desc: Bob the Tomato, Larry the Cucumber and all the Veggie Tales gang share stories from the Bible and learn about God who loves them.

programme.title: Night Owls & Early Birds
programme.sub-title: While We are Sinners, God Loves Us
programme.desc: Join Hoot, Savannah, Screech, Charlie, and Steve as they take a deeper dive into the truths found in God's Word.

programme.title: Arise Kids TV
programme.desc: ARISE Kids TV is jam packed full of faith and fun delivered by your favourite friends! Arise Kids TV believes in the next generation aims to inspire, connect and empower kids to follow Jesus and love life.

programme.title: Life with Paul De Jong
programme.desc: We like to call it 'soul food'. LIFE TV uses creative illustration, real life stories and biblical teaching to encourage and help viewers discover a greater purpose to their lives.

programme.title: Drive Thru History
programme.desc: Dave Stotts explores the amazing lives of the very first Christians. Using the Book of Acts as a roadmap, Dave travels the Mediterranean region to share the people, places, and events that launched the faith.

programme.title: Soul Sessions
programme.desc: An exploration into the New Zealand gospel music scene with a focus on Pacific musicians and artists. The award-winning artists are a mix of new and established faces, who share the vision of expressing their faith through music.

programme.title: Home is Where the Heart Is
programme.desc: Actor and craftsman Luke Macfarlane alongside designer Oliva Westbrooks bring heart, home, and hope to life-changing renovations - proving that sometimes, the greatest transformations begin from within.

programme.title: Branching Out
programme.desc: To help build a family tree, single mom Amelia tracks down her daughter's biological father. It becomes a journey of trust, love, and discovering the meaning of family.

programme.title: Answers with Bayless Conley
programme.desc: In The Power of God's Promises Part 2, Pastor Bayless continues sharing insights from his miraculous recovery after a boating accident.

programme.title: New Creation Church
programme.sub-title: God_s Plan To Prosper You In The End Times Pt 3 of 4
programme.desc: Pastor Joseph Prince preaches messages centred on the pure gospel of the grace of God.

programme.title: Billy Graham Classics
programme.desc: Signs of the return of Christ. 2 Peter 3 (Albany 1990).

programme.title: Impact for Life
programme.desc: In this message, Bev Mortlock teaches how we are to be a light to the world and shine Gods glory.

programme.title: Joyce Meyer: Enjoying Everyday Life
programme.desc: Do you lean on God's Word during trying times? Today, Joyce teaches on the importance of leaning into His Word and trusting in His wisdom to guide us through life's challenges.

programme.title: Finding the Light
programme.desc: Lizzie Oakes invites her guests into honest conversations about difficult seasons in their lives and discovers how the light of God's love got them through.

programme.title: Mosley
programme.desc: A species of creatures known as 'thoriphants' rebel against their life of servitude and embark on a treacherous journey to find the fabled city of Uprights.

programme.title: The Beast Within
programme.desc: After witnessing her father undergo a terrible transformation, a 10-year-old girl becomes ensnared by the dark ancestral secret that her parents have so desperately tried to conceal.

programme.title: You'll Never Find Me
programme.desc: A man living at the back of a desolate caravan park is visited by a desperate young woman seeking shelter from a violent storm. As the storm worsens, these solitary souls begin to feel threatened.

programme.title: Flight 149: Hostage of War
programme.desc: In 1990, Iraq takes the world by surprise and invades Kuwait. BA Flight 149 from London lands in Kuwait for a scheduled stop with men, women and children aboard. The plane never reaches its final destination.

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: A down-and-out stuntman must find the missing star of his ex-girlfriend's blockbuster film.

programme.title: If
programme.desc: After discovering she can see everyone's imaginary friends, a girl embarks on a magical adventure to reconnect forgotten IFs with their kids.

programme.title: The Heist Before Christmas
programme.desc: A Christmas-hating boy meets two Santas in the woods, one of whom claims to have fallen from his sleigh, but he is more interested in the other man when he learns he is on the run for robbing a bank.

programme.title: Lisa Frankenstein
programme.desc: A misunderstood teenager and a reanimated Victorian corpse embark on a murderous journey together to find love, happiness, and a few missing body parts.

programme.title: Sweet Dreams
programme.desc: Follows Morris, who must coach a misfit softball team of his fellow housemates during his mandatory stay at Sweet Dreams sober living in order to get his life back on track.

programme.title: Saturday Night
programme.desc: Tensions run high as producer Lorne Michaels and a ferocious troupe of young comedians and writers prepare for the first broadcast of "Saturday Night Live" on Oct. 11, 1975.

programme.title: Kraven the Hunter
programme.desc: Kraven's complex relationship with his ruthless father starts him down a path of vengeance, motivating him to become not only the greatest hunter in the world, but also one of its most feared.

programme.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
programme.desc: Godzilla and the almighty Kong face a colossal threat hidden deep within the planet, challenging their very existence and the survival of the human race.

programme.title: Smile 2
programme.desc: As global pop star Skye Riley preps for a world tour, she faces terrifying events and the pressures of fame, pushing her to confront her haunting past.

programme.title: The Strangers: Chapter 1
programme.desc: When their car breaks down in an eerie small town, a couple must spend the night in a remote cabin. Panic ensues as they are terrorised by three masked strangers who strike with no mercy.

programme.title: The Watchers
programme.desc: A 28-year-old artist gets stranded in an expansive, untouched forest in western Ireland. Finding shelter, she meets three strangers who are stalked by mysterious creatures every night.

programme.title: Transformers: The Last Knight
programme.desc: Humans are at war with the Transformers, and Optimus Prime is gone. It's now up to an unlikely alliance.

programme.title: Bloodshot
programme.desc: Bloodshot, an ex-killer for the mob, is kidnapped and injected with microscopic computers, turning him into a superhuman. Escaping his makers, he seeks revenge.

programme.title: Death Race 4: Beyond Anarchy
programme.desc: Connor Gibson, a Black Ops specialist, infiltrates a maximum security prison to enter the Death Race. A brutal world of no guards, no rules, no track, and no fear.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: When devoted lifeguard Mitch Buchannon butts heads with a new recruit, they must learn to put their differences aside after uncovering a criminal plot that threatens the future of the bay.

programme.title: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
programme.desc: Four high school kids discover an old video game console and are immediately drawn into the game's jungle setting, learning you don't just play Jumanji, you must survive it.

programme.title: Jumanji: The Next Level
programme.desc: As they return to Jumanji to rescue one of their own, nothing is as they expect. They will have to brave parts unknown and unexplored to escape the world's most dangerous game.

programme.title: Fast & Furious Presents: Hobbs & Shaw
programme.desc: Hobbs and Shaw, the trash-talking sworn enemies, must team up to take down a cyber-genetically enhanced anarchist with a bio weapon that threatens the fate of humanity.

programme.title: The Scorpion King
programme.desc: The ruler of wicked Gomorrah, who relies on a sorcerer's visions, lays waste to the tribes of the desert. The survivors hire an assassin to kill the sorcerer who turns out to be a beautiful woman.

programme.title: Fast & Furious 5
programme.desc: In this reunion of the fast and the furious, the speedsters are off to Brazil to attempt to defeat a corrupt businessman who wants them all wiped out.

programme.title: Fast & Furious 6
programme.desc: Hobbs has been tracking an organisation of lethally skilled drivers. The only way to stop the criminal mercenaries from stealing a top-secret weapon is to outmatch them at street level.

programme.title: Skyscraper
programme.desc: A security expert must infiltrate a burning skyscraper, 225 storeys above ground, when his family are trapped inside by criminals.

programme.title: Doom
programme.desc: A frantic call for help from a remote research station on Mars sends a team of mercenary Marines into action.

programme.title: The Fate of the Furious
programme.desc: When a woman seduces Dom into the world of crime, the crew face trials that will test them like never before.

programme.title: Khumba
programme.desc: Rejected by his superstitious herd, a half-striped zebra embarks on a daring quest to earn his stripes but finds the courage and self-acceptance to save all the animals of the Great Karoo.

programme.title: Shaun The Sheep Movie: Farmageddon
programme.desc: When an alien with powers crash-lands near Mossy Bottom Farm, Shaun the Sheep goes on a mission to shepherd the visitor home before a sinister organisation can capture her.

programme.title: Dinosaur Train: Adventure Island
programme.desc: Dinosaur siblings Buddy, Tiny, Shiny and Don try to reunite with their parents after an earthquake causes theme park robots to go rogue.

programme.title: Journey 2: The Mysterious Island
programme.desc: The journey begins when young adventurer Sean receives a coded distress signal from a mysterious island where no island should exist.

programme.title: Babe
programme.desc: A piglet won by a farmer in a raffle is raised by a sheepdog as one of her own and becomes a champion sheep-herder.

programme.title: The Pirates Who Don't Do Anything
programme.desc: Those vege-eating boys are back! This time they're cabin boys in a pirate theatre and are called upon to put aside their lazy, cowardly ways and help a princess rescue her brother who's been kidnapped.

programme.title: Despicable Me 4
programme.desc: Gru welcomes a new member to the family, Gru Jr, who's intent on tormenting his dad. However, their peaceful existence soon comes crashing down, when criminal mastermind Maxime Le Mal escapes from prison.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
programme.desc: Brooklyn teen Miles Morales is introduced to the limitless possibilities of the Spider-Verse, where more than one can wear the mask.

programme.title: Shark Tale
programme.desc: Oscar is a fast-talking little fish whose big dreams have a habit of landing him in hot water. Lenny is a great white shark with a sensitive side and a secret: he's a vegetarian.

programme.title: The Smurfs 2
programme.desc: When evil Gargamel kidnaps Smurfette, the Smurfs and their human friends led by Patrick unite to help her escape the clutches of the Naughties.

programme.title: Spirit Untamed
programme.desc: The next chapter in this beloved franchise begins as a young girl finds a connection to her mother's legacy as a trick rider and forms a bond with a wild mustang named Spirit.

programme.title: Beethoven
programme.desc: A vet targets a disaster-prone St Bernard for animal experimentation, and it's up to his family to save the cuddly canine.

programme.title: How to Train Your Dragon
programme.desc: Set in the mythical world of burly Vikings and fire-breathing dragons, a Viking teenager takes in an injured dragon and sees an opportunity to set his tribe on a new course.

programme.title: The Lost Tiger
programme.desc: Adopted by a wrestler kangaroo family, Teo's life changes when visions guide him to his roots. He sets off on an epic journey to save his homeland from destruction.

programme.title: Harold and the Purple Crayon
programme.desc: Harold can bring anything in his book to life by drawing it. When he grows up and steps out of the book and into the real world, he realises he has much to learn.

programme.title: Jumanji: The Next Level
programme.desc: As they return to Jumanji to rescue one of their own, nothing is as they expect. They will have to brave parts unknown and unexplored to escape the world's most dangerous game.

programme.title: Hard Kill
programme.desc: When a billionaire tech CEO hires a team of mercenaries to protect a lethal piece of technology, the mission becomes high risk when his daughter is kidnapped by a terrorist group.

programme.title: Monkey Man
programme.desc: A young man embarks on a quest for vengeance against the corrupt leaders who murdered his mother and continue to systemically victimise the poor and powerless.

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
programme.desc: When a teenage rebel is sent to Japan to live with his father, he is hooked on the treacherous world of street racing.

programme.title: Morbius
programme.desc: Biochemist Dr Michael Morbius tries to cure himself of a rare blood disease, but he inadvertently infects himself with a form of vampirism instead.

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: Based on the classic Hasbro naval combat game, this is the story of an international fleet of ships that come across an alien armada while on a naval war games exercise.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
programme.desc: On a dangerous assignment, Ethan chooses to save his team over completing the mission, allowing nuclear weapons to fall into the wrong hands. The IMF team must stop the fallout.

programme.title: Godzilla: King of the Monsters
programme.desc: The crypto-zoological agency Monarch faces off against the mighty Godzilla, who collides with Mothra, Rodan, and his ultimate nemesis: the three-headed King Ghidorah.

programme.title: Doom
programme.desc: A frantic call for help from a remote research station on Mars sends a team of mercenary Marines into action.

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man
programme.desc: After Peter Parker is bitten by a genetically altered spider, he gains new-found, spider-like powers and ventures out to save the city from the machinations of a mysterious reptilian foe.

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: Spider-Man's greatest battle begins when an evil corporation attempts world domination by deploying an army of super villains to crush Peter Parker.

programme.title: Fast & Furious 7
programme.desc: The lead-footed crew reunites in this turbo-fuelled tale of the vengeful brother of an international terrorist who sets his bloody sights on the boy racers that took his sibling down.

programme.title: Resident Evil: Welcome to Raccoon City
programme.desc: Survivors try to uncover the truth behind the evil Umbrella Corp while battling bloodthirsty zombies in the wastelands of Raccoon City.

programme.title: Carrie
programme.desc: A shy girl outcast by her peers and sheltered by her deeply religious mother unleashes telekinetic terror on her small town after being pushed too far.

programme.title: The House Bunny
programme.desc: When a bunny is evicted from the Playboy mansion, she hops into the dying Zeta sorority house. Her tutorials in sexy charm make the girls more popular than ever.

programme.title: Police Academy
programme.desc: As a crime wave sweeps the city and the police department suffers a shortage of officers, the mayor decrees that admission to the police academy will be open to any and all applicants.

programme.title: Police Academy 2: First Assignment
programme.desc: The team of bungling recruits have finally graduated and are let loose on an unsuspecting public as they take on their first cases.

programme.title: Kicking & Screaming
programme.desc: The coach of a hopeless kids' soccer team is headed for a showdown with his ultra-competitive father, but he has to toughen up if his squad has any chance of winning.

programme.title: Here Today
programme.desc: Veteran comedy writer Charlie forms an unlikely yet hilarious and touching friendship with New York singer Emma, and before long, each finds in the other a sort of soulmate.

programme.title: Liar Liar
programme.desc: A fast-talking lawyer and habitual liar discovers that he is unable to tell a lie or withhold the truth about anything for 24 hours after his son makes a birthday wish that comes true.

programme.title: Old School
programme.desc: Three friends try to recapture their glory days by opening up a fraternity much to the ire of Pritchard, a dean at the college who was the target of their abuse when they were all students.

programme.title: Holmes & Watson
programme.desc: Holmes and Watson join forces to solve a murder at Buckingham Palace. They soon realise that they only have 5760 minutes to solve the case, or the Queen will be next.

programme.title: Elf
programme.desc: Buddy, a human raised as an elf, is sent to the US in search of his true identity after nearly bringing Santa's operation to a catastrophic standstill due to his size.

programme.title: The Benchwarmers
programme.desc: Three older guys get to fulfil their childhood sporting dreams becoming heroes to the bullied, clumsy and athletically-challenged everywhere.

programme.title: Daddy's Home 2
programme.desc: Having finally gotten used to each other's existence, Brad and Dusty must now deal with their intrusive fathers during the holidays.

programme.title: The Mask
programme.desc: A mild-mannered clerk becomes a manic superhero when he stumbles upon a mysterious ancient mask.

programme.title: I Now Pronounce You Chuck & Larry
programme.desc: Two firefighters become domestic partners and must carry the masquerade to extremes when an overzealous bureaucrat becomes suspicious of their true relationship.

programme.title: The Whole Nine Yards
programme.desc: When hit man Jimmy "The Tulip" Tudeski moves into a comfy suburb, everyone's suddenly in danger of pushing up daisies.

programme.title: Holmes & Watson
programme.desc: Holmes and Watson join forces to solve a murder at Buckingham Palace. They soon realise that they only have 5760 minutes to solve the case, or the Queen will be next.

programme.title: Ladies in Black
programme.desc: Adapted from the novel by Madeleine St John, this is an alluring and tender-hearted comedy drama about the lives of a group of department store employees in 1959 Sydney.

programme.title: Friends with Benefits
programme.desc: Two best friends coming out of disastrous relationships, decide to make a 'friends with benefits' pact. However, soon they begin to fall in love and must re-evaluate their feelings for each other.

programme.title: She's Having a Baby
programme.desc: A couple face the terrors of adulthood, from interfering in-laws and career crises to overextended credit and maintaining a house, but are they up to the perils of impending parenthood?

programme.title: Notting Hill
programme.desc: Anna, the world's most famous movie star, and William, a stagnant business owner, cross paths and fall in love. But can two people fall in love with the whole world watching?

programme.title: Something Borrowed
programme.desc: Rachel is a generous and loyal pal to her engaged best friend Darcy. But after celebrating her 30th birthday, perpetual good girl Rachel unexpectedly ends up in the arms of Darcy's fiance.

programme.title: Shirley Valentine
programme.desc: Shirley takes a chance on adventure when she is invited on a vacation to Greece. She's back to her rebellious roots, saying yes to a wild fling with a rogue and the life she's always wanted.

programme.title: Life Without Dick
programme.desc: After Colleen accidentally kills her boyfriend Dick, mafia hit-man Daniel offers to take credit for the murder.

programme.title: Morning Glory
programme.desc: Trouble ensues when a feisty producer attempts to revive a struggling news program with feuding co-hosts.

programme.title: Honey: Rise Up And Dance
programme.desc: An aspiring and determined street dancer comes out of the shadow of her trained dancer sister, and joins a dance competition to win the prize of a college scholarship.

programme.title: Maid in Manhattan
programme.desc: An affluent politician falls for a gorgeous housemaid, thinking she's a guest at the flash hotel where she works, in this rags-to-riches update of the Cinderella story.

programme.title: Jane Eyre
programme.desc: Based on Charlotte Bronte's classic novel, this adaptation tells the story of Jane Eyre, a former orphan who now works as a governess for the wealthy and moody landowner, Mr Rochester.

programme.title: Little Women
programme.desc: Draws on both the classic novel and the writings of Louisa May Alcott, and unfolds as the author's alter ego.

programme.title: The Age of Innocence
programme.desc: A high society lawyer in a passionless marriage is enchanted by a ravishing woman with a scent of sexual scandal in 1870s New York.

programme.title: Morning Glory
programme.desc: Trouble ensues when a feisty producer attempts to revive a struggling news program with feuding co-hosts.

programme.title: Lion
programme.desc: A young Indian boy gets lost on the streets of Calcutta, miles from home. He is eventually adopted by an Australian couple, but years later he sets out to find his lost family.

programme.title: The Bourne Identity
programme.desc: Pulled from the sea, Jason Bourne discovers he has the skills of a very dangerous man and no memory of his past.

programme.title: About Schmidt
programme.desc: Warren Schmidt, an embittered man who has just retired after 32 years as an insurance company actuary, is about to taste a not-so-sweet slice of life.

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: Three girls are kidnapped by a man with 23 distinct personalities and they must try to escape before the next one emerges.

programme.title: RocknRolla
programme.desc: A story of sex, thugs and rock 'n' roll. London is ground zero for the changing times with mobsters from the East and criminals from the streets all vying to change the rules.

programme.title: Minority Report
programme.desc: In the year 2054, the head of a police unit specialising in pre-crime - the arrest and conviction of murderers before they commit their crime - finds himself accused of a future murder.

programme.title: Golda
programme.desc: Focuses on the intensely dramatic and high-stakes responsibilities and decisions that Golda Meir, also known as the Iron Lady of Israel, faces during the Yom Kippur War.

programme.title: Jarhead: Law Of Return
programme.desc: A squad of elite soldiers, risk their own lives in the hopes of saving an ally they've never met, when he's shot down flying through Syrian airspace.

programme.title: Miller's Girl
programme.desc: A creative writing assignment yields complex results between a teacher and his talented student.

programme.title: Catch Me If You Can
programme.desc: This is the extraordinary true story of a brilliant young master of deception and the FBI agent hot on his trail.

programme.title: Father Stu
programme.desc: After surviving a motorcycle accident, a former boxer and long-time agnostic, Stuart Long, starts to wonder if he can find his purpose and use his second chance to help others.

programme.title: Where The Crawdads Sing
programme.desc: Kya, an abandoned girl who raised herself in dangerous marshland, is drawn to two young men from town. When one is found dead, she is the main suspect.

programme.title: Golda
programme.desc: Focuses on the intensely dramatic and high-stakes responsibilities and decisions that Golda Meir, also known as the Iron Lady of Israel, faces during the Yom Kippur War.

programme.title: Wayne's World
programme.desc: Wayne and Garth host the biggest show on local public access TV. Now a sleazy network executive wants to produce a big-budget version. With the help of Wayne's girlfriend, they must battle to save the show.

programme.title: The Brady Bunch Movie
programme.desc: America's grooviest family are back in this big-screen adaptation of the long-running television series. The Bradys must save their home from foreclosure after a tax delinquency notice.

programme.title: Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: The epic story of love and adventure in a lawless land shows the complex portrayal of the most famous lawman in the Wild West.

programme.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
programme.desc: The Terminator is back and now he's one of the good guys, assigned to protect freedom fighter John Connor from a cyborg sent by the leader of the human resistance in the future.

programme.title: A Few Good Men
programme.desc: A slick, young Navy lawyer is assigned to investigate a murder case in which two Marines killed a fellow enlisted man, and no one's talking.

programme.title: The Dirty Dozen
programme.desc: Twelve American soldiers, all criminals, get a chance at redemption on a killing mission in World War II.

programme.title: The Hunt for Red October
programme.desc: A Russian submarine commander attempts to defect to the US, bringing both sides to the brink of war.

programme.title: Back to the Future
programme.desc: Marty, a typical teen, is accidentally sent back to 1955 in a plutonium-powered time machine. Marty must make sure his teenage parents-to-be meet and fall in love so he can get back to the future.

programme.title: Groundhog Day
programme.desc: A self-centred TV weatherman is caught in a personal time warp, forced to relive one strange day over and over again. The jokes explode in this marvellously inventive and offbeat comedy.

programme.title: Mercury Rising
programme.desc: An orphaned autistic savant who deciphers a government code in a magazine triggers a national security alarm that makes him an assassin's target.

programme.title: The Jackal
programme.desc: An FBI director works with a Russian agent and a jailed terrorist to hunt down the elusive Jackal, a master-of-disguise assassin on a deadly mission.
